summary: Stock Sphere - A trading insights community platform with user profiles, authentication, social feed for sharing trading ideas, and a course marketplace where traders can monetize their knowledge
architectural_notes: Built on Internet Computer Protocol using Motoko backend
No external broker API integrations - simplified community-focused platform
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Course placeholder thumbnail illustration showing trading chart or education theme (course-placeholder.dim_400x300.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity authentication system allowing users to sign in and sign out securely
Create user profile system where traders can set up their profile with name, bio, trading experience level, and profile picture
Build a social feed where authenticated users can post trading insights, ideas, and market commentary with timestamps
Add ability for users to view the complete feed of all trading insights from all traders on the platform
Implement user profile pages showing individual trader information and their post history
Design a clean, trust-focused visual theme with professional financial dashboard aesthetics, avoiding blue and purple color schemes
Create a marketplace page that displays all available courses in a grid layout with course cards showing thumbnail, title, creator name, price, and enrollment count
Create a create course page with a form allowing authenticated users to create new courses by entering title, description, price, and uploading a thumbnail image
Create a course detail page showing full course information, creator profile, enrollment button for non-enrolled users, and access to course content for enrolled users
Add a 'My Courses' section to user profile pages showing courses created by the user and courses they are enrolled in, with separate tabs or sections for each
Add a navigation link to the marketplace in the header layout alongside existing navigation elements
Create React Query hooks for all course-related backend operations including creating courses, fetching all courses, fetching user courses, enrolling in courses, and fetching user enrollments

new_feature_requests.summary: Social feed for sharing trading insights and ideas
Course marketplace for traders to monetize their knowledge
Create a Course data type in the backend with fields for course ID, creator principal, title, description, price (in tokens or ICP), thumbnail URL, creation timestamp, and enrollment count
Implement backend endpoints for creating courses (authenticated users only), retrieving all courses, retrieving courses by creator, and retrieving a single course by ID
Add an Enrollment data type to track which users have enrolled in which courses, with fields for enrollment ID, user principal, course ID, enrollment timestamp, and completion status
Implement backend endpoints for enrolling in courses (authenticated users only), retrieving user enrollments, and checking if a user is enrolled in a specific course
